message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I appreciate your offer, I'm aiming for a price closer to my initial proposal.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $19,000?
I understand your position, but $19,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
